item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Snap, Arm Holdings, Figma, Lyft and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Prediction market traders slash odds Trump tariffs survive Supreme Court ruling
item.description: On Kalshi, contracts tied to whether the court would rule in favor of Trump's tariffs slipped to around 30% from nearly 50% before Wednesday's hearing...

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Unity Software, Rivian, Pinterest, Trex & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Auto repair chain Monro soars after Carl Icahn takes 15% stake to become largest shareholder
item.description: Icahn disclosed ownership of 4.4 million shares, or almost a 15% stake in Monro, according to a new regulatory filing.

item.title: Xpeng to let other carmakers use its partly-autonomous driving system
item.description: Chinese electric car company Xpeng said German automaker Volkswagen would be the first client for its new driver-assist system.
